texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: author: Major Hayden date: '2024-08-25' summary: >- Get spell checking in multiple languages automatically within input fields in Firefox. 🗣️ tags:
texts.text: author: Major Hayden date: '2024-08-25' summary: >- Get spell checking in multiple languages automatically within input fields in Firefox. 🗣️ tags:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Bienvenidos! ^t1 I've been learning Spanish for just over a year and I often type messages in either Spanish or English (my native language) with coworkers and friends. Just like most people, I make spelling mistakes in both languages. 🙃
texts.text: Bienvenidos! ^t1 I've been learning Spanish for just over a year and I often type messages in either Spanish or English (my native language) with coworkers and friends. Just like most people, I make spelling mistakes in both languages. 🙃

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Firefox offers a feature for multi-language spell checking and translations but it can be a bit challenging to set up. This post explains how to load languages into Firefox and use them for spell checking.
texts.text: Firefox offers a feature for multi-language spell checking and translations but it can be a bit challenging to set up. This post explains how to load languages into Firefox and use them for spell checking.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Take a trip over to [Dictionaries and Languages Packs] on Mozilla's site. Note that there are  two columns  available to you here:
texts.text: Take a trip over to [Dictionaries and Languages Packs] on Mozilla's site. Note that there are  two columns  available to you here:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: In the second column, click on the language you want to add for checking spelling. In my case, I picked the  Spanish (Spain) Dictionary  along with the  Spanish (Mexico) Dictionary . Install the dictionaries you want just like any other add-on!
texts.text: In the second column, click on the language you want to add for checking spelling. In my case, I picked the  Spanish (Spain) Dictionary  along with the  Spanish (Mexico) Dictionary . Install the dictionaries you want just like any other add-on!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: page in Firefox and you should see your languages under  Languages  and  Dictionaries  on the left side.
texts.text: page in Firefox and you should see your languages under  Languages  and  Dictionaries  on the left side.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Find an input field and right click inside the field. You should see a  Languages  context menu appear. Roll over that menu and a new menu pops out to the side:
texts.text: Find an input field and right click inside the field. You should see a  Languages  context menu appear. Roll over that menu and a new menu pops out to the side:

texts.label: caption
texts.orig: Firefox context menu showing multiple languages
texts.text: Firefox context menu showing multiple languages

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Click the checkbox to enable the languages that you want to use with the spell checker. That takes effect immediately!
texts.text: Click the checkbox to enable the languages that you want to use with the spell checker. That takes effect immediately!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: [^t2]: Thank you for reading this far.
texts.text: [^t2]: Thank you for reading this far.
